sentences.sContent: Members of the council agreed that was an important forum for discussion.
sentences.sCn: 理事会成员们一致认为那是一个用于讨论的重要论坛。

synos.tran: 论坛，讨论会；法庭；公开讨论的广场

remMethod.val: for + u(看作you， 你) + m(看作me， 我) → 让你我说话的地方 → 论坛

trans.tranOther: an organization, meeting, TV programme etc where people have a chance to publicly discuss an important subject
